home.tuto: Choose the tool you want to use from the dropdown list above.

replay_cutter.wrongResolution: Your video must be in {{ expectedHeight }}p, yours is in {{ currentHeight }}p
replay_cutter.inputFile: Click here to send your video file
replay_cutter.videoIsBeingAnalyzed: Please wait, the video is being analyzed...
replay_cutter.upload: Analyze this game with EBP's AI
replay_cutter.uploadAll: Analyze selected games with EBP's AI

toast.timeCodesCopiedClipboard: Timecodes have been added to your clipboard
toast.videosCutHere: Your videos have been cut here: {{filePath}}
toast.videoCutHere: Your video has been cut here: {{filePath}}
toast.noGamesFoundInStatistics: No games were found on {{map}} with these scores ({{orangeScore}} vs {{blueScore}}). If you think this is an error, please let me know.
toast.noGamesFoundInVideo: No games were found in your video. If you think this is a mistake, please let me know.

settings.teamNameDescription: You can force the team names during detection.
settings.freeText: Free text at the end of the filename

upscale.title: Upscaling
upscale.description:
Your video is in 720p, but Tools only supports 1080p.
Do you want to upscale it before analysis?
Be aware, this may take some timeâ€¦

game_history.title: Export your game history
game_history.firstOption: If the player has a public tag, enter it here...
game_history.secondOption: Otherwise, click here to log in to your EVA account.
game_history.timeBetweenPagesExplanations: Time in seconds to wait between each page. The more pages you export, the more you may need to increase this time.
game_history.edgeIsNotInstalled: Edge does not appear to be installed on your computer. Please install it.

confirmation.p1: Please do not interact with anything during the export. If it completes successfully, a green notification will confirm it.
confirmation.p2: "Tools" may encounter issues when exporting your games. If you see a message saying the username was not found or if a blank table appears, please follow these steps:
confirmation.li2: Close and then reopen the browser.
confirmation.p3: If you have exported a large number of games, please wait 15 minutes before starting another export.

footer.newUpdate: A new update is available, download it by clicking here.
footer.beta: You are using a beta version of the app, please do not share it.
